description:
This course will provide a broad overview of cyber security concepts and practices. You have lifetime access to these 10 lectures that can guide you anytime, anywhere when you are stuck! You'll learn how to develop secure & web applications, locate flaws & write secure code.

You'll also be a given a free ebook on "Cyber Crime" which includes real-life hacking concepts through linux & a lot of topics that'll guide you to Internet Security/Ethical Hacking

The course unfolds over 10 video lessons & 1 ebook on Cyber Crime. Learning is self-paced, but the full series can be experienced in about two weeks.

Section-1: This section includes introduction to web apps, its development & walk-through of live applications

Section-2: This section you'll learn about the loop holes & gather some basic knowledge on application's working

Section-3: This is the section where you'll learn to write secure code & defend attacks.

Secture-4: Test yourself with a small quiz
title: Web Application Hacking & Countermeasures
